c74object.name: fftjit.getPeaks
c74object.digest: Distills a FFTJIT matrix to its local peaks
c74object.description: Using local peak finding at a given reach and thresholding, fftjit.getPeaks distills and removes less present frequnecies from a frame

method.name: thresh
method.digest: A minimum amplitude that must be crossed for each bin. Otherwise it will be 0
method.description: A minimum amplitude that must be crossed for each bin. Otherwise it will be 0

method.name: reach
method.digest: The bins around the evaluated bin that will be checked.
method.description: The bins around the evaluated bin that will be checked. If the number is 4 (or 5) two bins before and after the current bit will be checked.
